description: Revisions to planning permission ref: 2008/5358/P and Listed Building Consent ref: 2008/5366/L granted 8 April, 2009 including relocation of the secondary escape stair and refuse/recycling store from Grays Inn Road to Pentonville Road; relocation of the entrance to retail unit 1 towards the apex of the building; alterations to roof finish, raised parapet to 283 Pentonville Road, installation of timber double glazed sash windows, and alterations to basement layout and cycle storage.
